Pre-Game Insights: For host Georgia, the opportunity to land an early blow on the likely favorite to top the billing will be seen as too great to pass up.
Willy Sagnol’s side on high alert, though the attacking duo of Mikautadze and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia in particular will be looking to dish out damage for the home side.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Only a few months have passed since Georgia and the Czech Republic got acquainted for the first time at Euro 2024 before they were pitted against one another again in the UEFA Nations League.
The spoils were shared when these two teams collided in Hamburg at this summer’s European Championship, having both been assigned in Group F for their maiden matchup.
Georges Mikautadze opened the scoring for The Crusaders before Patrick Schick equalized in the second half, though that ended up securing the Czechs their only point of the competition.
